intents.name: Monitor Due Dates
intents.description: Keeps track of invoice due dates to ensure timely payments.
examples: Check the due date for invoice 67890.
When is the payment due for this invoice?
Track the due dates for all pending invoices.

intents.name: Identify Overdue Payments
intents.description: Identifies invoices that have not been paid by their due date.
examples: Identify any overdue payments in the system.
List all unpaid or balance invoices.

intents.name: Flag Overdue Invoices
intents.description: Flags overdue invoices for sending reminders.
examples: Set a reminder for overdue payments.

name: Overdue Payment Detector
scope: Monitors invoice due dates, identifies overdue payments, and flags overdue invoices for reminders.
